issue.title: [Rust] Update thrift library dependencies
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-9127](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-9127). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Update to latest version of apache thrift (1.3)

 

Rationale:

We were trying to update the version of `byteorder` that an internal project used, but arrow/parquet -> depends on parquet-format-rs -> depends on thrift. 

 

`[~sunchao]`  recently updated the thrift-pin in parquet-format in <https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/6626,>  so now it is possible to update the thrift version here as well

 

The thrift dependency was postponed when the dependencies were last updated. See:

<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/6626>

https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-8124
